sentences.sContent: Whatever the substance of graphology, the character is there nonetheless.
sentences.sContent_eng: Whatever the substance of graphology, the character is there nonetheless.
sentences.sCn: 无论笔迹学的主旨是什么，其特性依然存在。

remMethod.val: graph(书写) + ology(…学) → 笔迹学

words.tran: 形象的；图表的；绘画似的
生动地；活灵活现地；用图表表示；轮廓分明地
[测] 制图学；制图法；图表算法

trans.tranOther: the study of  handwriting  in order to understand people’s characters
